Desc.entry: Represents all venues across the South Yorkshire region including Rotherham, Doncaster, Barnsley and Sheffield. Helps place meetings, seminars and conferences and deliver excellent venue accommodation and corporate hospitality packages. Offers free, impartial advice with a high quality service tailored to meet specific needs. These include a free venue location service, familiarisation visits, venue and accommodation booking service, delegate literature, venue availability and quotations.

Pubs.entry: Yorkshire South Conference and Venue Directory
